Lessons

Chapter Weeks Code Topic Dates
Proofs 1–2 P1 Proof and Contradiction *
3–4 P2 Induction *
Strategy 5–6 S1 Try Small Cases *
7–8 S2 Case Bashing & Pigeonhole Principle *
9–10 S3 Extremal Principle *
Combinatorics 11–12 C1 Double Counting and Bijections *
13–14 C2 Game Theory and Invariants
15–16 C3 Graph Theory
Number Theory 17–18 N1 Divisibility and Primes *
19–20 N2 Modular Arithmetic
21–22 N3 Diophantine Equations
Algebra 23–24 A1 Polynomials, Sequences, Graphs *
25–26 A2 Inequalities
27–28 A3 Functional Equations
Geometry 29–30 G1 Angle and Length Chasing *
31–32 G2 Coord and Trig Bashing
33–34 G3 Intro to Geometric Transformations
Strategy 35–36 S4 Backsolving *
37–38 S5 Notation, Representation, and Visualisation
39–40 S6 Problem Exploration & Training
